name: @nycopportunity/screeningapi-docs
title: NYC Benefits Platform | Screening API
description: Documentation for the NYC Benefits Screening API https://screeningapidocs.cityofnewyork.us/
author: The Mayor's Office for Economic Opportunity

scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development pttrn -np -nl -s && NODE_ENV=development PORT=7000 concurrently "pttrn -w" "pttrn serve -w" -p "none"
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production pttrn -np -nl -s && NODE_ENV=production PORT=7000 concurrently "pttrn -w" "pttrn serve -w" -p "none"
